doc: How do we run benchmarking for our code-base?
The Parity benchmarks made me think that one of the primary features of the C++ codebase should be performance (along with platform reach and smallness).
Are we achieving that?   If not, why not?   We should have a roadmap to "win" in this area.    If we can't be the best in this domain then why bother having a C++ client at all?
